casebody.data:
STATE
v.
WORLEY 2018-0757 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 20, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion for stay of execution of death sentence pending direct appeal. Motion granted. No execution date shall be set while this appeal is pending. On appellant's request to extend time to file record. Request granted. The record shall be filed no later than November 28, 2018.
